languages.text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.
languages.original_text: Все союзники в отряде, кроме ксеносов, получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристике{/g}, выбранной для "Цвета Человечества".

traits.locale_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same characteristic as was chosen for humanity's finest.
All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten (außer Xenos) in der aktuellen Gruppe erhalten +5 auf die gleiche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g}, die für die Besten der Menschheit gewählt wurde.
languages.original_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten (außer Xenos) in der aktuellen Gruppe erhalten +5 auf die gleiche Eigenschaft, die für die Besten der Menschheit gewählt wurde.

languages.text: Tous les alliés du groupe actuel, à l'exception des xénos, bénéficient d'un bonus de +5 à la même {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} que celle choisie pour l'élite de l'Humanité.
languages.original_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés du groupe actuel, à l'exception des xénos, bénéficient d'un bonus de +5 à la même {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} que celle choisie pour l'élite de l'Humanité.

languages.text: 当前队伍中的所有盟友（异形除外）也同样会受到“人类精英”加成影响，相应{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高5点。
languages.original_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

traits.locale_text: 当前队伍中的所有盟友（异形除外）也同样会受到“人类精英”加成影响，相应属性提高5点。

languages.text: Todos los aliados excepto los xenos del grupo actual ganan +5 a la misma {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} elegida para Lo mejor de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados excepto los xenos del grupo actual ganan +5 a la misma característica elegida para Lo mejor de la Humanidad.

languages.text: 現在のパーティー内の異種族を除くすべての味方は、「人類の傑物」で選択したものと同じ{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5増加する。
languages.original_text: All allies, excluding xenos, in the current party gain +5 to the same {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} as was chosen for Humanity's Finest.

traits.locale_text: 現在のパーティー内の異種族を除くすべての味方は、「人類の傑物」で選択したものと同じ能力が+5増加する。

languages.text: Все союзники в отряде, кроме ксеносов, получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристике{/g}, выбранной для "Цвета Человечества".

languages.text: Zenolar hariç mevcut gruptaki tüm dost birimler, İnsanlığın En İyisi becerisi için seçilen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğe{/g} +5 kazanırlar.
